response.original_title: Alva Noto + Ryuichi Sakamoto with Ensemble Modern: utp_
response.overview: Alva Noto and Ryuichi Sakamoto, backed by Ensemble Modern and a live "visual score", perform their fourth collaborative work "utp_" at the National Theatre in Mannheim, Germany on November 16, 2007.
response.title: Alva Noto + Ryuichi Sakamoto with Ensemble Modern: utp_
